00041 #ifndef _LIBNFC_MIFARE_H_
00042 #  define _LIBNFC_MIFARE_H_
00043 
00044 #  include <nfc/nfc-types.h>
00045 
00046 // Compiler directive, set struct alignment to 1 uint8_t for compatibility
00047 #  pragma pack(1)
00048 
00049 typedef enum {
00050   MC_AUTH_A = 0x60,
00051   MC_AUTH_B = 0x61,
00052   MC_READ = 0x30,
00053   MC_WRITE = 0xA0,
00054   MC_TRANSFER = 0xB0,
00055   MC_DECREMENT = 0xC0,
00056   MC_INCREMENT = 0xC1,
00057   MC_STORE = 0xC2
00058 } mifare_cmd;
00059 
00060 // MIFARE command params
00061 struct mifare_param_auth {
00062   uint8_t  abtKey[6];
00063   uint8_t  abtAuthUid[4];
00064 };
00065 
00066 struct mifare_param_data {
00067   uint8_t  abtData[16];
00068 };
00069 
00070 struct mifare_param_value {
00071   uint8_t  abtValue[4];
00072 };
00073 
00074 typedef union {
00075   struct mifare_param_auth mpa;
00076   struct mifare_param_data mpd;
00077   struct mifare_param_value mpv;
00078 } mifare_param;
00079 
00080 // Reset struct alignment to default
00081 #  pragma pack()
00082 
00083 bool    nfc_initiator_mifare_cmd(nfc_device *pnd, const mifare_cmd mc, const uint8_t ui8Block, mifare_param *pmp);
00084 
00085 // Compiler directive, set struct alignment to 1 uint8_t for compatibility
00086 #  pragma pack(1)
00087 
00088 // MIFARE Classic
00089 typedef struct {
00090   uint8_t  abtUID[4];
00091   uint8_t  btBCC;
00092   uint8_t  btUnknown;
00093   uint8_t  abtATQA[2];
00094   uint8_t  abtUnknown[8];
00095 } mifare_classic_block_manufacturer;
00096 
00097 typedef struct {
00098   uint8_t  abtData[16];
00099 } mifare_classic_block_data;
00100 
00101 typedef struct {
00102   uint8_t  abtKeyA[6];
00103   uint8_t  abtAccessBits[4];
00104   uint8_t  abtKeyB[6];
00105 } mifare_classic_block_trailer;
00106 
00107 typedef union {
00108   mifare_classic_block_manufacturer mbm;
00109   mifare_classic_block_data mbd;
00110   mifare_classic_block_trailer mbt;
00111 } mifare_classic_block;
00112 
00113 typedef struct {
00114   mifare_classic_block amb[256];
00115 } mifare_classic_tag;
00116 
00117 // MIFARE Ultralight
00118 typedef struct {
00119   uint8_t  sn0[3];
00120   uint8_t  btBCC0;
00121   uint8_t  sn1[4];
00122   uint8_t  btBCC1;
00123   uint8_t  internal;
00124   uint8_t  lock[2];
00125   uint8_t  otp[4];
00126 } mifareul_block_manufacturer;
00127 
00128 typedef struct {
00129   uint8_t  abtData[16];
00130 } mifareul_block_data;
00131 
00132 typedef union {
00133   mifareul_block_manufacturer mbm;
00134   mifareul_block_data mbd;
00135 } mifareul_block;
00136 
00137 typedef struct {
00138   mifareul_block amb[4];
00139 } mifareul_tag;
00140 
00141 // Reset struct alignment to default
00142 #  pragma pack()

00144 #endif // _LIBNFC_MIFARE_H_
